description.value:
Trigger Hao Jin signals the beginning of the match.

Effect The trap rolls initiative.

stealth.details: +23 (expert) or @Check[type:perception|dc:38|traits:action:seek] (master) to notice the four sensors

details.description: Four remote sensors at each corner of the arena cause bursts of freezing magic to erupt from random tiles on the arena and stop creatures in their tracks.
details.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:40|name:Disable One Sensor|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (6th level; counteract DC 38) to disable one of the sensors
details.routine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action per disabled sensor. On each action, the trap causes a random 10-foot-by-10-foot space in the arena to suddenly freeze. Each creature that begins its turn in a frozen space takes [[/r (2d6+2)[cold]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:40|basic:true] save). A creature that critically fails its save also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} for 1 round; if it was already slowed, the creature instead becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] for 1 round. Any amount of fire damage dealt to a slowed or immobilized creature removes the condition. Frozen tiles become unfrozen at the beginning of the trap's next turn.
